name: Joe I. Ned
description:
Notes:
Yes, the trajectory line is a bit off, gravity just didn't want to play nicely.
Yes, the head's rotation flipping is very annoying, please tell me if you know how to fix it.
I don't know why but itch.io seems to hate using the proper aspect ratio of 2:1, so the start and end screens are off.

Credits:
Liam: 3D modelling and animation
https://veryhighping.itch.io/: idea and end screen
Ernest: main menu and concept art
me: the code

Music:
Main menu and end screen: Graveyard Shift by Kevin Macleod

In game: Witch Waltz by Kevin Macleod
